content:
Hello, my name is Loïc Rouchon as you probably have guessed. I’m a software engineer working mostly with JVM based technologies. I’m passionate about software engineering in the broad meaning of the term. This includes languages, designs, frameworks, tooling, methodologies and so on. Every that helps to write better software in faster way.
In general, I like to understand how things work. Therefore, I have also strong interests in sciences and in particular in theoritical physics.
If you want to know more, you can follow me on the following social media.
